game.name: Clan Attack
game.description:
Oh, great! It will be great to be a part of this amazing brand new shooting game where every moment is full of unlimited action and fun. Hope you would enjoy it and refer it to your friends and families! Many dangerous ninjas full of weapons keep coming on the screen time to time. The only way to avoid the danger is to kill as many ninjas as you can. You will also be lashed with multiple swords to deal with these monsters. 

Are you ready to take up this unique action-packed challenge? Join Clan Attack game and be prepared to throw your sword to them when they land on the ground! Remember your enemies are very fast and will not show sympathy towards you. Your alertness and sharp reflexes will help get through all the hurdles and make you win in the end. Play like a champion till end to score the best score in this free online action game!

The longer you survive in the game, the higher score you will hit the screen in the end. Atmegame.com features thousands of top titles under the category of action games that are free to play online, no download required. Play single player or multiplayer gun shooter games online and get a pleasure of becoming a true action hero in just a few clicks! We guarantee you to meet the best thrill and entertainment in our html5 action-packed challenges.
